 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּ֫תֶן‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ps.68.5|Ps 68:5]]</sup> a ==venomous serpent==, perhaps ==cobra== (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פתן‎</span> [[Eccl.39.30|Eccl 39:30]] Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פִּתְנָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, whence perhaps Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; — only in poetry: plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּתָנִים ראֹשׁ‎</span> [[Deut.32.33|Deut 32:33]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲמַת תַּנִּינִם‎</span>), [[Job.20.16|Job 20:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרוֺרַת פ‎</span> v[[Job.20.14|Job 20:14]] singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּ֫תֶן‎</span> [[Ps.91.13|Ps 91:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּין‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵרֵשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Ps.58.5|Ps 58:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֻר פָּ֑תֶן‎</span> [[Isa.11.8|Isa 11:8]].
